articles.title: Red Sox CBO Craig Breslow reportedly prioritizing finding a GM this offseason
articles.description:
The Red Sox haven't employed a general manager since Breslow became the team's chief baseball officer.

The post Red Sox CBO Craig Breslow reportedly prioritizing finding a GM this offseason appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox CBO Craig Breslow aims to hire a general manager this offseason.
The team has been without a GM since Breslow's appointment in 2023.
This decision could significantly affect team strategy and local fan engagement.

articles.title: Patriots move on from Ja’Lynn Polk, reportedly trading him to Saints
articles.description:
The Patriots will receive a 2027 sixth-round pick in the deal.

The post Patriots move on from Ja’Lynn Polk, reportedly trading him to Saints appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots trade Ja'Lynn Polk to the Saints for a 2027 sixth-round pick.
Polk's departure opens roster space for new talent ahead of the season.
Local fans may see changes in team dynamics as roster evolves.
